name: Dead Babies in Space
description:
Made for PAL Jam in 3 hours.

Dead Babies in Space is a one time use game in which you must use the gravitational force of surrounding planets to get your ship to earth without colliding with anything.

Everything is on the line and you've only got one shot at this. Triumph and earth will be saved. Fail and earth along with all the babies on the planet will be destroyed.

There are no second chances. Made By:
  • SebastianScaini
  • GabeD
  • GameDevLiam
